title: Images and coloured text in email signature of thunderbird app on android/ samsung
creator: info687
content: It appears you need to copy and paste the desktop email signature from an email to use on the Thunderbird mobile app rather than the html version in the settings. I have copied and pasted my email signature from an email and tried using the Samsung flow app to copy it to clipboard. Both ways don't bring across images or coloured text and I can't see where to add/ edit either. Is there a way to add images or colour the text on the android mobile version of the Thunderbird email signature?

title: Incorrect sorting of letters in the list
creator: vmailbox
content:
An old email with a similar subject line is always first in the list.

Maybe the time zone is incorrect according to RFC2822? But this is not a reason to make the letter top and a potential way to abuse attention.

title: Copy mail on a folder sent
creator: maildefabe
content:
Hello,

I am using Thunderbird on a Huawei P30 Android with EMUI 12.

Emails sent from my mobile are not being copied to the "Sent" folder, neither on the smartphone nor on the server. As a result, I cannot find them on my phone or on my PC running Linux Ubuntu 24.04.

Did I forget to configure something in the app on my smartphone?

Thank you.

Fabienne
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:135.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/135.0

title: It is showed only few (and old) email (in Yahoo account) ok other account

content: I succefully set my other email account (gmail) and add my yahoo email account but for yahoo app show only few and old email. No problem with other account instead. How can I resolve?

title: TBmobile doesn't react to qr code
creator: jg21
content:
I tried to activate TB for Android (128 beta) and TB for windows.

I can create the QR code on my computer. When asked on Android to photograph the code, a window for the cam opens and i can see the code but Android does not react and there is no possibilityto manually take a photo of the code.

my phone: realme c55 (RMX3710) Android version: 14

Can anybody help??

Thanks

Joe
